$description: Class progression data (levels 1-20). Generated from spell slot tables.
$note: Full casters: wizard, cleric, bard, druid, sorcerer. Half casters: paladin, ranger. Pact: warlock. Martials: fighter, rogue, barbarian, monk.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: Cast wizard spells using Intelligence; you have a spellbook.

features.name: Ritual Adept
features.description: Cast any ritual spell in your spellbook without preparing it.

features.name: Arcane Recovery
features.description: Recover spell slots on short rest.

features.name: Scholar
features.description: Gain expertise in one skill: Arcana, History, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, or Religion.

features.name: Wizard Subclass
features.description: Choose an Arcane Tradition.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability by 2, or two by 1.
